Description:
Extensive living and style in the riverside quarter
A superb Studley Park outlook from an entertainers' balcony is the cream on the top of this sensational multi-level townhouse in a secure and secluded rear setting of a coveted residential complex. Clifton Hill's riverside quarter near Yarra trails and parkland provides an idyllic inner-city backdrop to this stylish home affording a fabulous lifestyle enhanced by multiple alfresco areas, excellent features and remote-control 2-car garage. This terrific property offering a healthy rental return for investors of $750-$800 per week is just moments to cafes, train station, shopping strips and schools, the large layout of this quiet contemporary townhouse includes 3 sizable robed bedrooms, 3 bathrooms (2 ensuites), smart living and dining, excellent Smeg-appointed kitchen with Calacatta marble benchtop, laundry, heating/cooling, alarm, video intercom and polished hardwood floors.
Insights: 19/184 Noone Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
LIVE IT UP WITH ROOFTOP TERRACE VIEWS
SOLD by Miles Real Estate. A huge rooftop terrace taking in sensational views including the city skyline is the perfect place to launch a busy summer schedule of alfresco entertaining with this superb town residence. A peaceful interior ambience complements the light-filled, two-level layout where the living is easy and the lifestyle is exciting just footsteps to it all - Clifton Hill Village, Darling Gardens, recreation centre and train station (only minutes to the CBD). This attractive home with own street entry and remote-control garage (internal) is ideal for private inner-city enjoyment whether it's your first purchase or a smart investment and features two downstairs bedrooms with built-in robes, spacious living room to balcony, kitchen/meals with Blanco appliances, bath and powder rooms, laundry, ducted heating, storage and entertainment terrace.
Insights: 49 John Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
The perfect mix for inner-city success
Light up your lifestyle with this brilliant Victorian and start superb inner-city living in a quiet village setting. Beyond an outstanding Boom-style profile, this picturesque terrace reveals an impressive mix of classical and contemporary styles where a smart 2 bedroom and study layout arrives at a recently renovated rear section. From a traditional arched hall, the inviting living room leads to a stunning new kitchen finished in stone and fitted with stainless-steel appliances. There's an immaculate just-completed bathroom, separate laundry and the landscaped courtyard garden is a sun-drenched oasis for secluded alfresco entertaining. With OFPs and polished floorboards, this attractive home is not to be missed moments to the Clifton Hill Village, Darling Gardens, river trails and Clifton Hill train station.
Insights: 40 Myrtle Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Period grace, 2 street frontages
With authentic Edwardian character, this stylishly refurbished semi-detached residence with scope for extension (STCA) on a deep block with access and parking from Clifton Avenue is perfectly positioned close to Village cafes, primary schools, Yarra parkland and station. With lots of light and a return verandah entry from a pretty cottage garden, it comprises 2 double bedrooms (one with BIRs), an elegantly proportioned sitting room, spacious informal living/dining flowing to a paved and landscaped garden with northerly light, well-equipped kitchen and a delightful period-style bathroom/laundry with atrium entry. Features include polished Baltic floors, OFPs, plantation shutters, ducted heating, split-system air conditioning and storage.
Insights: 11 Myrtle Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Large Roof Top Terrace
Genuine large spaces available here. This townhouse offers two great sized bedrooms main with ensuite both with BIR, second sparkling bathroom, open plan kitchen / meals / lounge area, euro laundry with the highlights being the large roof top entertainment deck which is one of three outdoor spaces & remote controlled garage that has room for two cars.
The location is a feature in itself with the obvious access to the eastern freeway & CBD but look closer and you'll see how close you are to the Dight River Falls & The Main Yarra Trail. Other features include air conditioning , polished timber floors and stone top benches to wet areas.
Leased for $2499pcm till 28/10/17, buy now & move in later or keep it as a rental & watch your savvy investment grow in value as large homes like this one become even more scarce.
Insights: 6/184 Noone Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Great location, fantastic opportunity
Wonderfully positioned near Merri Creek and parkland, this apartment surrounded by lush trees has all the right ingredients for the perfect lifestyle or a sound investment. In a boutique block of only 12 Apartments. Offers security entrance, bedroom (BIR), living room with city views, kitchen, meals, central bathroom, OSP and laundry facilities. A first class lifestyle and location close to shops, cafes and transport.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Heritage distinction, Darling Gardens outlook
This landmark Victorian villa (1883) with sweeping views over the Darling Gardens, formerly the house of Acting Premier George Langridge, has been meticulously rebuilt to combine period grace with light-filled modern style. Set behind a John Patrick- designed heritage garden on a vast block (593 sqm approx), this splendid family residence offers a versatile floor plan incorporating an elegantly proportioned sitting room and library (potential 4th & 5th BRs, both with gas-insert OFPs) opening from a wide Baltic-floored hallway; an expansive conservatory-style living/dining room and study area, flowing to a luxuriant north-facing garden and al fresco entertaining terrace; bespoke kitchen with premium appliances, adjoining fitted laundry/scullery; 3 double bedrooms (main overlooking sunny internal courtyard, with dressing room and stunning ensuite), plus large semi-ensuite family bathroom with clawfoot bath and shower. Moments from Queens Parade and close to schools & transport, this impeccable home includes 4 car off-street parking and features hydronic heating, custom storage throughout, security system and superbly restored period detail. Nelson Alexander Pty. Ltd.
Insights: 11 North Terrace, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Quiet & Convenient Village Victorian
Nestled in the Clifton Hill Village's best-kept secret of tranquil Abbott Grove, this delightful timber Victorian is so incredibly central yet so quiet and private it's almost hard to believe. Capturing full north light along its deep Marshall Place boundary, this picturesque one and a half-fronted home offers a wide and surprisingly spacious three bedroom layout culminating at a secluded entertainment deck and established courtyard garden. Discover this previously-updated period gem a matter of only metres to cafe, shops, primary school, train station and parkland, and further improve when ready to completely capitalize on a sensational village lifestyle. Includes arched hallway, open-plan living and dining area, kitchen with Blanco and Bosch appliances, bright bathroom, separate laundry, two WCs, reverse-cycle heating/cooling and rainwater tank.
Andrew Simondson : 0412 999 128
Insights: 2 Abbott Grove, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Dream Size & Scope Directly Opposite Parkland
Prized parkland views, huge north-facing rear block and powerful potential - this charming double-fronted bungalow offers an A-grade Clifton Hill combination that most can only dream of! Directly opposite Quarries Park in an enviable inner-city setting, this previously extended 1920s home on a 375 sqm allotment (approx.) including superb rear ROW is sure to inspire excellence with either a stylish contemporary enhancement or a stunning renovation. Complete the picture to your exacting standards when ready in the perfect inner-city position near schools, cafes, shops, Yarra trails and train station. This comfortably presented home with original features comprises three bedrooms, built-in-robes, open-plan living and dining with soaring light-capturing windows, bright kitchen, spacious bathroom with corner spa bath, laundry area, gas heating, pressed metal ceilings, leadlight windows, open fireplace, paved alfresco area and deep rear garden.
Andrew Simondson : 0412 999 128

Description:
Heritage Splendour with a Modern Twist
A wonderfully wide streetscape surrounded by other period gems finds this vintage Victorian terrace that's certain to impress with its clever design and stylish enhancements along with instant access to the best Clifton Hill has to enjoy. Filled with natural light, the home's gorgeous interior comprises two generous bedrooms, mezzanine-style study and contemporary bathroom, spacious open-design living and dining areas complemented by a modern granite-bench kitchen with breakfast bar, soft-close drawers, Miele cooking appliances and dishwasher. Add to this polished timber floors, Nobo panel heaters, internal laundry facilitates and large attic storage space, plus a delightful back garden with high fences for privacy and handy ROW access. A most enviable city-edge location; walking distance to Queens Parade trams and Clifton Hill Station, cool cafes and boutique shops, primary and secondary schools, as well as the delightful environs of both Darling Gardens and Edinburgh Gardens. Exceptional living in a perfect position! Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 61 Hodgkinson Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Address: 1/262 Alexandra Parade East Clifton Hill VIC 3068
Description:
Style on Yarra Edge
A superb first home or great addition to your investment portfolio, tucked away in a popular little pocket of Clifton Hill, is this immaculately presented one bedroom apartment, offering space and security. Modern and bright, comprising open plan living with meals area, private & spacious south facing balcony, fully equip kitchen with SS appliances, gas cooking and dishwasher plus a tiled bathroom with combined laundry facilities. Additional features include split system heating / cooling, video intercom and security entrance, remote lock up garage and secure storage unit.
Nestled close to Dights falls, it will be hard to choose your favourite destination for walks, runs or a picnic! Minutes from the increasingly popular Smith Street and the CBD, you can jump on a tram/train/bus and experience the many restaurants, bars, live shows & shops which are all at your fingertips. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
CHARMING CHARACTER WITH MODERN STYLE
Set in a lovely streetscape in a warm and friendly neighbourhood, this tastefully renovated, charming period weatherboard home will delight. Discover original details including baltic pine floorboards, high ceilings, intricate archway details, light roses and cornices. Two large bedrooms have fire places, one has built-in robes, built -in bookcases and a study nook. The other has courtyard access. Also an updated bathroom and cleverly concealed laundry. Further down the stunning hallway find a modern kitchen with stone tops and stainless appliances, overlooking a lovely dining room. Then down to the light-filled sunken lounge, with gorgeous open fire, that opens out onto a delightful courtyard garden with laneway access. Also included are a large attic for storage, ducted heating and cooling, solar panels and an alarm system. Charming character with modern style and convenience; moments from the station, cafes and shops, the CBD at your door, and beautiful Yarra Bend Park just a stroll down the road. Inspection is a must!
Insights: 12 Kiewa Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Spacious Light Filled Apartment...
Within the keenly sought environs of Clifton Hill, a charming suburb that offers an envied lifestyle rather than just an address, is this generously proportioned apartment that has been tastefully renovated throughout. A mere stroll to the Village & Queens Parade each with their own fine eateries, specialty stores and renowned fresh produce, acres of delightful Yarra River parkland and your choice of public transport options this 1st floor abode will appeal to the first home buyer, investor or downsizer alike.
Blessed with a sunny demeanour and located within a well-cared for complex with security entry the apartment comprises 2 double bedrooms with built in robes, spacious living room with northern orientation, gorgeous kitchen with floating timber floor, fully tiled bathroom with laundry facilities, separate toilet and single undercover car space.
An all too rare opportunityâ€¦

Description:
Secluded, filled with light, CBD views
This elegant town residence in a secure contemporary development with landscaped garden entrance is city-edge living at its low maintenance best! With full-length windows to all principal rooms, it offers a well-zoned floor plan comprising an expansive living and dining room with spectacular CBD views and a north-facing covered terrace for al fresco entertaining, large study/3rd BR overlooking the garden, custom Miele-equipped kitchen with stone benchtops, 2 double bedrooms (BIRs, vast ensuite with walk-in shower to main), stylish family bathroom, powder room and concealed laundry. Including an internal entry garage, this inviting home close to Dight's Falls, Clifton Hill Village, schools and station features polished bamboo floors, alarm, ample storage and split-system air conditioning.

Description:
GRAND SCALE VICTORIAN VILLA ON VAST LAND
This landmark heritage residence facing the Darling Gardens, on a splendid allotment (940 sqm approx) with driveway access from two sides, represents a unique restoration opportunity. Solid and substantial, here is one of the last unrenovated properties of its scale in the inner north, and the potential is truly exciting. A contemporary of the iconic 'House of the Gentle Bunyip' on the other side of the Gardens, it incorporates graciously-proportioned principal rooms, including an elegant drawing room, dining room and four double bedrooms with ornate open fire places and other classic period details. Later additions offer two kitchens, bathrooms and an additional bedroom and include an impressive coved-ceiling studio and SC bungalow. This outstanding historic home with an exclusive address is a once in generation opportunity, close to Queens Parade and schools.
Insights: 8 South Terrace, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 1 other 5 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Impeccably renovated, ideally positioned
This picture-perfect Edwardian residence set behind a landscaped cottage garden combines period elegance, space and light-filled contemporary style. In a select neighbourhood close to Village shops, schools, transport and parkland, it comprises three double bedrooms (main with pitched ceiling, ensuite and WIR), spacious living/dining opening through multifolds to secluded garden with off-street parking, custom kitchen (imported appliances and stone benchtops), stylish family bathroom with freestanding bath and shower, separate WC and laundry. Including vast and versatile lined loft storage and an entertaining deck (mains gas BBQ and fridge), this delightful home features Victorian ash floors, generous storage throughout, central heating and split-system air conditioning.

Description:
Cool contemporary style, top position
This stunning apartment is a must-see for homebuyers and investors. Moments from Dight's Falls and Yarra parkland, and close to Village cafes and station, here is light-filled living in an elegant new development with lobby, lift entry and basement parking. Featuring polished timber floors, air conditioning, video intercom and premium fittings, it comprises 1 double bedroom with BIRs, a spacious living/dining room flowing to a screened terrace, custom kitchen (Blanco appliances, stone benchtops) smart fully-tiled bathroom with walk-in shower, plus concealed laundry. Make a great start in this secluded enclave just 15 minutes from the CBD! 52sqm (approx.) internally. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd.
Insights: 12 other 1 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Versatile residence in Yarra environs
An historic warehouse faÃ§ade at the relaxing river-end of the village reveals this brilliantly designed residence offering stylish space and complete seclusion in a secure boutique block. An exceptional city-edge opportunity where lifestyle is paramount; stroll to Yarra parkland, trails, cafes and train station from this impressive townhouse featuring a versatile interior that's superbly designed and appointed for outstanding executive living. Includes video intercom, alarm, heating/cooling, ducted vacuum, polished hardwood floors, large attic room, 2 high-ceiling bedrooms (BIRs), flexible 3rd bedroom or office/lounge, dining room, living room spilling onto entertainment deck with retractable awning, Smeg-equipped stone kitchen, 2 bathrooms, laundry plus electric gates/remote-control garage.

Description:
Superbly renovated facing Darling Gardens
Here is low-maintenance CBD-edge living at its immaculate best! This spacious modern residence overlooks the serene Darling Gardens, moments from Queens Parade cafes and transport, Clifton Hill Primary and close to Brunswick Street. Filled with light, it offers a superbly zoned floor plan comprising 3 double bedrooms (ensuite and WIR to main), spacious living room with balcony, dining room/informal living flowing to paved northerly courtyard garden, custom galley kitchen (stone benchtops, Bosch appliances and pantry), stylish bathroom and powder room/laundry. Including a covered al fresco entertaining patio, potential off-street parking and ample storage, this stunning home features split-system a/c, quality carpets and premium inclusions. (Body corporate currently $1,574 per annum)

Description:
Central Inner-City Convenience
Superb terrace-style street frontage, a light-filled interior and north-facing rear orientation are the perfect complement to this irresistible townhouse with desirable Darling Gardens proximity and zoning to Gold Street Primary School. Freshly painted and immaculately presented in an attractive plane tree setting, this fabulous two-storey residence is immediately ready for your relaxing, low-upkeep lifestyle enjoying coveted inner-city convenience near Queens Parade cafes, Smith and Brunswick Streets, Yarra parkland/trails and train station. An ideal investment, first home or downsizing opportunity; the generous layout includes three double bedrooms (BIRs; main with ensuite), living room, family/meals area opening to sunny entertainers' courtyard and secure off street parking, well-appointed modern kitchen, two bathrooms, powder room, separate laundry, ducted heating and polished timber floors.
Paula Beavis : 0407 267 366
Insights: 3/68 Noone Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Stylish, Solid and Packed with Potential
A sublime heritage neighbourhood with Quarry Park and Merri Creek trails at the end of the street finds this brick Victorian terrace offering immediate liveability with options to modernize and possibly extend (STCA). Current floorplan includes three bedrooms (two large), bathroom and separate powder room, wide central lounge/dining area through to the functional kitchen/meals. Add to this gas heating and cooking, full-size laundry, plus a surprisingly spacious back garden with large workshop/storeroom, ROW access and plenty of room to expand. Also close to village cafes and Clifton Hill Station, Spensley Street Primary School, Mayors Park, Darling Gardens and Queens Parade trams. Inspiration charm in an aspirational location! Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 13 Caroline Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.
